author: yussuf56
title: ONE OF THE BEST HOTELS ever I stayed. Every thing was perfect.
text: They are very good. Their customer support and services are extremely helpful and excellent. The only thing is they have to improve and ask their workers at the restaurant specially breakfast time to be more smiley. A few were not. I could rate them 5 but the only reason is the restaurant staff.
